response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe will greatly benefit your endeavors. Given its value to you, I propose a price of $11,000 for the product. This offer allows you to secure it at a slight premium over its cost to me, ensuring both parties benefit from the transaction. Please let me know if this proposal meets your expectations or if you require further details.", "product_price": 11000}
